name: Aquabious
description:
A big flood has occurred in your city and has washed away almost all the people in the city.  Fortunately, a few of the citizens survived and are waiting for the last man standing. Be sure to make proper decisions on items you wish to keep for the survival.

Beware of waters, staying still for too long can drown you. Keep moving, and stay hydrated. 

Good Luck, Survivor 

Controls:

A - Turn left

D - Turn Right

E - Open inventory and crafting menu
